text: Yann Sommer (born 17 December 1988) is a Swiss professional footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper for Inter Milan and the Switzerland national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Basel U-21 2005–06 1.
